a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of drinkers who "binged" on heaviest day of drinking in last week, United Kingdom,
Share of drinkers who "binged" on their heaviest day of drinking in the last week. "Binge" drinking is defined as a man consuming more than 8 units of
alcohol in a single day, or 6 units of alcohol in a single day in the case of a woman.
Data source: Office for National Statistics (ONS)
